last_episode_to_air.name: See You Soon, Macaroon
last_episode_to_air.overview: Niagara Falls is the backdrop as the Bumblers, Maddie, Max, Sally, and Sofia try to stay one step ahead of the Doctor in an attempt to ensure their freedom and make the score of a lifetime.

name: Imposters
overview: Maddie, a persona shifting con-artist who is as beautiful as she is dangerous, leaves her unwitting victims tormented when they realize they have been used and robbed of everything – including their hearts. But things get complicated when her former targets, Ezra, Richard, and Jules team up to track her down.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In season two Maddie's determined to reclaim her life after she and the Bumblers escape her former cohort Max and FBI Agent Patrick. But in her attempts to settle into a new normal, Maddie quickly realizes that living in the game was not nearly as difficult as leaving it. Just as Ezra, Richard and Jules have begun to master the art of the con, unforeseen events send them off on a wild, unexpected adventure. Meanwhile, Max – along with “The Doctor” and Patrick are out to seek revenge. With the stakes higher than ever, Maddie and the Bumblers must stay one step ahead in order to maintain their freedom.

episodes.name: My So-Called Wife
episodes.overview: Newlyweds Ava (Maddie) and Ezra's blissful marriage shatters when he discovers his sweet wife has disappeared with all their money and enough sensitive information to destroy his family if he turns to the authorities for help. As a devastated Ezra reels and searches for answers, Maddie expertly prepares for her next con with her trusted cohorts.

episodes.name: My Balls, Dickhead
episodes.overview: Maddie tries to hook her latest mark but finds herself drawn to the mysterious Patrick. Ezra and Richard learn that being a con artist is harder than it looks... and make a surprising discovery.

episodes.name: We Wanted Every Lie
episodes.overview: While Ezra, Richard and Jules find a crucial clue to Maddie’s whereabouts, Maddie's interest in Patrick rings alarm bells for Max, Sally, and their dangerous boss - The Doctor.

episodes.name: Cohen, Lenny Cohen.
episodes.overview: Ezra, Richard and Jules visit Maddie's parents. Sally makes a discovery with dangerous consequences. As Maddie gets closer to Patrick, Lenny Cohen shows up to set things straight.

episodes.name: Is a Shark Good or Bad?
episodes.overview: Enjoying their con-artist lifestyle, Ezra, Richard and Jules close in on Maddie. Lenny Cohen (Uma Thurman) cleans up Sally's mess. Maddie is devastated when the Doctor gives her a new assignment.

episodes.name: The Maddie Code
episodes.overview: Patrick throws Maddie a birthday party with some surprising guests. Max comes to the rescue. Richard makes a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Frog-Bikini-Eiffel Tower
episodes.overview: An unanticipated trip home puts Ezra at a crossroads about his future. Maddie and Patrick’s get-away is equal parts romance and deception. Jules comes face-to-face with her past.

episodes.name: In The Game
episodes.overview: Ezra, Richard and Jules give Maddie some life-altering information. Maddie and Max hatch a plan to save their lives, but they need the bumblers' help. Maddie and Patrick talk marriage.

episodes.name: Ladies and Gentlemen, the Doctor Is In
episodes.overview: As the wedding nears, Maddie struggles to keep her plan on track, Patrick tries to make a deal with Ezra, and Max teaches Richard tricks of the trade, while Jules has an unexpected encounter.

episodes.name: Always Forward, Never Back
episodes.overview: As Patrick and Maddie exchange marriage vows, the long-awaited showdown between con artists and FBI agents plays out, though it is unclear whose side Maddie is really on, or who will be victorious.

episodes.name: Fillion Bollar King
episodes.overview: In an attempt to sell the ring they stole, the Bumblers head to Richard's hometown. Maddie learns that leaving her past behind is harder than she thought.

episodes.name: Trouble Maybe
episodes.overview: On the run after a violent confrontation, Maddie finds refuge in an unlikely place. Meanwhile, the Bumblers hide out in Mexico as Ezra's conning ways reach risky new heights.

episodes.name: Old Unresolved Shit
episodes.overview: Maddie continues to struggle with her demons. The Bumblers have to scramble to find a way back to America when they learn that the Doctor is closing in on Ezra's family.

episodes.name: Andiamo
episodes.overview: A sudden threat derails Maddie's attempt to find peace of mind. Ezra and Rosa's passion heats up while the Bumblers make their desperate escape across the border.

episodes.name: Maybe/Definitely
episodes.overview: Richard, Jules, and Poppy hit an unexpected snag in their attempt to retrieve the ring. Ezra arrives to save his family, while Maddie reconnects with her past.

episodes.name: That's Enough. Off You Go.
episodes.overview: Maddie tracks down the man she thinks could set her free. Jules shares more than a drink with an unlikely confidant. The Doctor makes a surprising decision regarding the Bumblers’ fate.

episodes.name: Maid Marian on Her Tip-Toed Feet
episodes.overview: Friends and foes converge on the Bumblers as they hide out at Jules' remote family cabin. Maddie, Sally and Max finally reunite for a perilous new con.

episodes.name: Phase Two Sucks
episodes.overview: In pursuit of the ring, the Bumblers don new identities under Maddie's tutelage; Ezra forms an unlikely relationship with a Toby Jug collector; Max and Sally try to dig up dirt from the Doctor's past.

episodes.name: The World Needs Heroes. Over.
episodes.overview: Ezra's Toby jug con leads to an unlikely encounter with an old flame; The Bumblers, Maddie, Max, and Sally set in motion their risky plan to take down the Doctor.

episodes.name: See You Soon, Macaroon
episodes.overview: Niagara Falls is the backdrop as the Bumblers, Maddie, Max, Sally, and Sofia try to stay one step ahead of the Doctor in an attempt to ensure their freedom and make the score of a lifetime.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In season two Maddie's determined to reclaim her life after she and the Bumblers escape her former cohort Max and FBI Agent Patrick. But in her attempts to settle into a new normal, Maddie quickly realizes that living in the game was not nearly as difficult as leaving it. Just as Ezra, Richard and Jules have begun to master the art of the con, unforeseen events send them off on a wild, unexpected adventure. Meanwhile, Max – along with “The Doctor” and Patrick are out to seek revenge. With the stakes higher than ever, Maddie and the Bumblers must stay one step ahead in order to maintain their freedom.
